narrative.title: 6Th Australian Division 2Nd Aif - 1940Q4
narrative.situation: British Commonwealth Infantry Division (Australian Imperial Force) deployed in North Africa during 1940Q4.
narrative.objectives: Infantry assault division - preparation for Operation Compass offensive against Italian 10th Army. Training focus: fortress assault, combined arms operations, desert warfare.
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

weather.terrain: Coastal Egypt/Libya border - coastal plain, rocky desert, escarpments

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: High morale and unit cohesion (volunteer force)
Physical fitness and endurance (average age 26, excellent condition)

environment.terrain_type: Coastal Egypt/Libya border - coastal plain, rocky desert, escarpments
